about_the_game:
The official fan pack for Midnight Witch! It contains massive spoilers about the story, so we advise you finish the game before looking into it!

Midnight Witch is (and always will be) 100% free, but you can decide to support me by buying the fan pack! This will greatly help me keep working on new games as an indie developer.

Thank you so much for your support!

High-resolution artworks

40+ high-resolution artworks of the best in-game scenes.

Official Soundtrack

20 audio tracks, including the opening & ending themes composed by In Uchronia.

Concept Art Booklet

A behind-the-scene digital booklet including concept art and developer notes about the development of the game.


In order to access the content of the fan pack, please right click on Midnight Witch within Steam and pick "Manage", then "Browse Local Files". This will take you to the Midnight Witch game directory where you will find a "Midnight Witch Fan Pack" folder.
